metadata.title: Samsung Galaxy EF-DT870 Keyboard & Cover for Tab S7 (Renewed)
features: SIMPLE SETUP: Start typing in a flash thanks to intuitive pogo pin connectors that simplify installation of the Galaxy Tab S7 Book Cover Keyboard. Customize the exact angle of the screen by positioning the magnetized back cover, now designed with a free angle hinge.

GREATER FOR ON-THE-GO: The sleek, lightweight design of the Galaxy Tab S7+ Book Cover Keyboard enhances the device’s portability without sacrificing its protection. Grab your covered tablet on the way out the door and feel confident that both the screen and back of the tablet will be protected. The cover also secures the S Pen, which attaches magnetically to the back of the tablet and charges when docked.
Package Dimensions: 2.032 L x 25.908 H x 17.78 W (centimeters)

The redesigned, detachable Book Cover Keyboard* for Galaxy Tab S7 features an expanded trackpad, larger keys and increased pitch.** This brings a PC-like experience to your fingertips, making it easier to scroll and type. The keyboard’s dedicated function keys and shortcuts expand the power of DeX mode, boosting productivity. *Book Cover Keyboard sold separately. **As compared to Galaxy Tab S6 Book Cover Keyboard. ***Only apps that are optimized for Samsung DeX.
